cookiePolicyStrings.bannerText:
We use cookies to personalize your experience on our website. By continuing to use the website, you agree to the use of cookies.
Further information on cookies can be found in our privacy policy.
createAccount.headLine: Set up your account
createPersonalAccount.headLine: New account
groupSizeInfo: Up to {{count}} people can join a group conversation. Video calls work with up to 3 other people and you.
guestOptionsInfoText: 任何有连结的人都可以加入对话，即使他们没有安装Wire。
guestRoomConversationHead: 你的团队以外的访客可以参加这个对话。

inviteMessageNoEmail: 我正在使用Wire，访问get.wire.com或者加我为好友。
legalHoldDescriptionOthers:
Legal Hold has been activated for at least one person in this conversation.
All messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and timed messages.
legalHoldDescriptionSelf:
Legal Hold has been activated for your account.
All messages will be preserved for future access, including deleted, edited, and timed messages.
Your conversation partners will be aware of the recording.
login.headline: Log in
login.subhead: Enter your email address or username.
messageDetailsNoLikes: No one has liked this message yet.
messageDetailsNoReceipts: No one has read this message yet.
messageDetailsReceiptsOff: Read receipts were not on when this message was sent.
modalAccountCreateMessage: 通过创建一个帐户，你将失去群内的对话历史记录。
modalAccountDeletionMessage: 我们将通过电子邮件或手机短信发送链接给您。请点击链接从而永久删除您的账号。
modalAccountLeaveGuestRoomMessage: 对话历史记录将被删除。要保留它，下次创建一个帐户。
modalAccountLogoutOption: 删除在此设备上所以个人信息和会话。
modalAccountNewDevicesHeadline: 您的账号在以下时间、设备登录：
modalAccountNewDevicesMessage: 如果您没有新增该设备，请移除该设备并且重设您的密码。
modalAccountReadReceiptsChangedMessage: You can change this option in your account settings.
modalAccountRemoveDeviceMessage: 请输入密码以确定删除该设备
modalAssetParallelUploadsMessage: 您一次最多可以发送 {{number}} 个文件。
modalAssetTooLargeMessage: 您可以发送最大 {{number}} 的文件。
modalAvailabilityAvailableMessage: You will appear as Available to other people. You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
modalAvailabilityAwayMessage: You will appear as Away to other people. You will not receive notifications about any incoming calls or messages.
modalAvailabilityBusyMessage: You will appear as Busy to other people. You will only receive notifications for mentions, replies, and calls in conversations that are not muted.
modalAvailabilityDontShowAgain: Do not display this information again
modalAvailabilityNoneMessage: You will receive notifications for incoming calls and for messages according to the Notifications setting in each conversation.
modalCallEmptyLogMessage: There were no calls to base the debug report on.
modalCallNoGroupVideoMessage: 视频通话在群聊中不可用。
modalCallNoMicrophoneHeadline: 无法在没有麦克风的情况下呼叫
modalCallNoMicrophoneMessage: 您需要允许您的浏览器使用麦克风来打电话。
modalCallSecondOngoingHeadline: 挂断在另一设备上的电话吗？
modalCallSecondOngoingMessage: 您每次只能呼叫一位用户。
modalCallSecondOutgoingMessage: 您每次只能呼叫一位用户。
modalConnectCancelMessage: 取消发送给 {{user}} 的好友请求。
modalConversationClearMessage: 这将清除所有设备上的对话历史记录。
modalConversationDeleteMessageHeadline: 确定仅为自己删除该信息？
modalConversationGuestOptionsAllowGuestM: 无法允许客人。请再试一次。
modalConversationGuestOptionsDisableGues: 无法删除客人。请再试一次。
modalConversationGuestOptionsRequestCode: 无法请求访问链接。请再试一次。
modalConversationGuestOptionsRevokeCodeM: 无法撤销访问链接。请再试一次。
modalConversationLeaveMessage: 将不能够在此聊天发送或接收消息。
modalConversationMessageTooLongMessage: 您最多可以发送包含 {{number}} 个字符的信息。
modalConversationNotConnectedMessageMany: 您选择的参与者之一不希望加入对话。
modalConversationRemoveGuestsMessage: 当前的访客将从对话中删除。新访客将不被允许。

modalConversationRevokeLinkMessage: 新访客将无法加入此链接。目前的访客仍然可以使用。
modalConversationTooManyMembersMessage: 最多{{number1}}人可以加入对话。目前只有{{number2}}个人拥有空间。
modalImproveWireMessage: I agree that {{brandName}} may create and use anonymous usage and error reports to improve the {{brandName}} App. I can revoke this consent at any time.
modalIntegrationUnavailableMessage: 感谢您对机器人服务的关注。我们目前正在开发下一个版本，因此机器人服务暂停使用。敬请关注。
modalNoCameraMessage: {{brandName}} doesn’t have access to the camera.[br][faqLink]Read this support article[/faqLink] to find out how to fix it.
modalPictureTooLargeMessage: 您可以使用图片多达{{数}} MB。
modalPictureTooSmallMessage: 请选择一个画面至少是320×320像素。
modalSessionResetMessage: If the problem is not resolved,[link]contact[/link] us.
modalUploadContactsMessage: 我们并未收到您的信息。请重新尝试上传您的联系人。
modalUserBlockMessage: {{user}} 将不能联系您或将您加入到任何对话中。
modalUserUnblockMessage: {{user}} 今后能够将您加为好友以及重新加入到群聊中。
notificationMemberJoinMany: {{user}} 添加了 {{number}} 个成员到对话中
notificationSettingsDisclaimer: You can be notified about everything (including audio and video calls) or only when someone mentions you or replies to one of your messages.
participantDevicesDetailHeadline: 请检查在[bold]{{user}} 的设备[/bold] 上显示的设备指纹。
participantDevicesHeadline: Wire为每个设备设置了一个唯一的指纹。您可以和 {{user}} 提供的指纹进行比对来验证此对话的真实性。
participantDevicesOutdatedClientMessage: {{user}} 正使用旧版本的Wire，无法显示其使用的设备。
preferencesAVNoCamera: {{brandName}} doesn’t have access to the camera.[br][faqLink]Read this support article[/faqLink] to find out how to fix it.
preferencesAVPermissionDetail: 从您的浏览器首选项中启用
preferencesAVTemporaryDisclaimer: Guests can’t start video conferences. Select the camera to use if you join one.
preferencesAccountDataDetail: Help make {{brandName}} better by sending anonymous usage and crash reports.
preferencesAccountLeaveGuestRoomDescript: 您将不再能够访问此对话中的消息。
preferencesAccountMarketingConsentDetail: Receive news and product updates from {{brandName}} via email.
preferencesAccountReadReceiptsDetail: When this is off, you won’t be able to see read receipts from other people. This setting does not apply to group conversations.
preferencesAccountUsernameHint: 至少2个字符，仅可使用a—z, 0—9以及下划线。
preferencesDevicesActiveDetail: 如果您不能识别以上设备，请立即移除并重设密码。
preferencesDevicesFingerprintDetail: Wire为每个设备设置了一个独特的指纹码。您可以通过比对指纹码来验证您的设备和对话。
preferencesDevicesRemoveDetail: 如果您不再使用该设备请将其移除，您将会立即从该设备上登出。
preferencesDevicesSessionDetail: 如果设备指纹不匹配，请在双方的设备上重置链接，并生成新的密钥。
preferencesOptionsBackupExportSecondary:
Create a backup to preserve your conversation history. You can use this to restore history if you lose your computer or switch to a new one.
The backup file is not protected by {{brandName}} end-to-end encryption, so store it in a safe place.
preferencesOptionsBackupImportSecondary: You can only restore history from a backup of the same platform. Your backup will overwrite the conversations that you may have on this device.
preferencesOptionsCallLogsDetail: 此信息可帮助Wire Support诊断呼叫问题。
preferencesOptionsContactsDetail: 分享您的通讯录来寻找其他好友。我们将您的信息匿名处理并且不会泄漏给任何第三方。
preferencesOptionsEmojiReplaceCheckbox: 使用 emoji 来代替文字表情
preferencesOptionsPreviewsSendCheckbox: 为发送的链接创建图像预览
preferencesOptionsPreviewsSendDetail: 链接的图像预览对其他人也是可见的。
readReceiptsToogleInfo: When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
receiptToggleInfo: When this is on, people can see when their messages in this conversation are read.
searchInviteDetail: 这将帮助您找到其他联系人。我们将您的资料匿名处理并且不与任何人分享。
searchListEveryoneParticipates: 您所有的好友都已经在此群聊中了。
